CustomField.description: Deprecated. Refer to the MUSW__Complaint2 object.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL(MUSW__Closed_Date__c), TODAY() - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), IF(MUSW__Closed_Date__c < TODAY(), MUSW__Closed_Date__c - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate),TODAY() - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)))
CustomField.label: Age
